messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_10",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync Notes 2025-11-10",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-10T11:05:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync
Date: 2025-11-10
Time: 10:00–10:45 JST
Location: Zoom
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

Agenda (from calendar event):
- Review Planning milestone (2025-11-10)
- Discuss WEB-101 scope
- Align on priorities and next steps

Key Notes:
1) Planning milestone (2025-11-10)
- Confirmed today as the formal Planning milestone for the Website Redesign (WEB project).
- Outcome expected: agreed scope for WEB-101 and initial backlog for Development phase starting 2025-11-20.

2) WEB-101 – Core Feature scope
- Current JIRA: WEB-101 "Website Redesign - Core Feature" (status: In Progress).
- Discussed must-have scope for first release and what can be pushed to later iterations.

3) Priorities and next steps
- Alex to update WEB project brief and share in the proj-website-redesign Slack channel.
- Jordan to review dependencies before Development milestone (2025-11-20).
- Sam to provide estimates for remaining WEB-101 tasks.

Action Items:
- [Alex] Send summary and update calendar if a follow-up sync is needed.
- [Jordan] Comment on WEB-101 in JIRA with technical constraints.
- [Sam] Break down WEB-101 into sub-tasks before EOD tomorrow."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_sync_agenda_2025_11_10",
      "name": "WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync Agenda",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-09T16:15:00+09:00",
      "content": "Title: WEB Website Redesign – Planning Sync
Organizer: Alex Smith
Date: 2025-11-10
Time: 10:00–10:45 JST
Location: Zoom
Participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

Context:
Quick planning sync on the Website Redesign (WEB project) before the Planning milestone on 2025-11-10. Confirmed via Slack in #proj-website-redesign.

Proposed Agenda:
1) Planning milestone (2025-11-10)
   - Confirm expectations and deliverables for the Planning phase
   - How this feeds into Development (starting 2025-11-20) and Launch (target 2025-11-30)

2) WEB-101 – Core Feature
   - Review current scope and assumptions
   - Identify any gaps before Development milestone
   - Decide what must be in scope for Launch vs. later iterations

3) Priorities & Next Steps
   - Top 3 priorities for this week on WEB
   - Assign action items for Alex, Jordan, and Sam
   - Decide if a follow-up sync is needed later this week

Notes:
- Reference JIRA issues: WEB-100 (Initial Setup – Done), WEB-101 (Core Feature – In Progress).
- Output of this meeting should be: updated WEB-101 scope in JIRA and a short summary posted in the proj-website-redesign Slack channel."
    }
  ]
}
